Prerequisite: Rogue, proficiency with rapiers

Benefit: While wielding a rapier, if you are the only creature adjacent to the target you may use your sneak attack damage even if you do not have combat advantage against the target with this attack.

Revision (11/30/2009)

Page 20: Flash of the Blade benefit is change to, While wielding a rapier, if you are the only creature adjacent to the target you may use your sneak attack damage even if you do not have combat advantage against the target with this attack.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381, page(s) 70.
